extension.description: Use this addon to manage your HoloVisi system's underlying operating system. From here you can manage the entire system so you don't have to worry about what runs under the hood.[CR][CR] From here you can change your network connectivity, your keyboard layout and language and enable/disable remote access including Samba and SSH.
使用该组件管理HoloVisi所在操作系统。在此处你可管理整个系统， 修改网络连接、键盘布局、语言，以及开启/关闭Samba和SSH等远程访问。
